HTMLLinkElementHref.summary: The href property of the interface contains a string that is the URL associated with the link.

remarks.para: It reflects the href attribute of the link element. If the element does not have an href attribute, then this property's value is the empty string ("").

blockquote.para: Every <link> element must contain either one or both of the href or imagesrcset attributes. This means, for each valid <link>, either this property or will not be empty.

HTMLLinkElementHref.value: A string that contains a URL, or the empty string ("") if there is no href element.
